name: Paul Conrad
personality: Driven and disciplined, with a strong sense of duty and loyalty
story: Sean joined the military straight out of high school, eager to serve his country and make a difference. He quickly rose through the ranks thanks to his impressive skills as a leader and his unwavering commitment to the safety of his men. Though he has seen some tough times and lost good friends along the way, he remains determined to keep pushing forward and doing what needs to be done to protect his squad and complete their missions.
